title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Re/Max Holdings Inc

content.text: On October 2, 2013, Re/Max Holdings Inc went public and started trading on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol RMAX.
On November 19, 2013, Re/Max Holdings Inc announced a 2-for-1 stock split. Existing shareholders received one additional share for each share they owned on December 17, 2013.
On August 2, 2018, Re/Max Holdings Inc announced another 2-for-1 stock split. Existing shareholders received one additional share for each share they owned on August 27, 2018.
On December 10, 2018, Re/Max Holdings Inc announced a secondary offering of 3,000,000 shares of Class A common stock. The offering was primarily for selling shareholders.
On January 15, 2019, Re/Max Holdings Inc completed the acquisition of booj, an award-winning real estate technology company. The acquisition aimed to enhance Re/Max's technology capabilities.
On February 19, 2019, Re/Max Holdings Inc announced a quarterly cash dividend of $0.21 per share of Class A common stock.
On May 16, 2019, Re/Max Holdings Inc announced a quarterly cash dividend of $0.21 per share of Class A common stock.
On September 30, 2019, Re/Max Holdings Inc completed the acquisition of First, a technology company specializing in lead generation and relationship management for real estate agents.

news.headline: RE/MAX Strengthens World-Class Technology Platform with Expanded Strategic Partnership and Advanced Back-Office Capabilities
news.summary: RE/MAX, LLC, a global leader in residential real estate, is significantly enhancing the value of its technology through an expanded strategic partnership with Inside Real Estate. The move will bring the acclaimed BoldTrail platform to brokerages in all RE/MAX company-owned regions across the U.S. and Canada via a rolling launch starting this fall.

news.headline: CATHLEEN RAFFAELI ELECTED TO RE/MAX HOLDINGS, INC. BOARD OF DIRECTORS
news.summary: RE/MAX Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:RMAX), the parent company of RE/MAX, LLC, a global leader in real estate brokerage franchising, and Motto Mortgage, the first and only national mortgage brokerage franchise brand in the U.S., is pleased to announce that Cathi Raffaeli joined its Board of Directors on August 19, 2024. Raffaeli has also been appointed to the Board's Compensation and Audit committees. With over 25 years of experience in board leadership across financial services, technology and education

news.headline: Experienced buyer/investor bump in key detached housing markets in the GTA, GVA and Fraser Valley signals watershed moment, says RE/MAX
news.summary: With first-time buyers locked out of the country's most expensive housing markets, the move-up/down segments, as well as investors, have been fuelling detached home-buying activity in the first six months of 2024 in the Greater Toronto Area (GTA), Greater Vancouver Area (GVA) and Fraser Valley, according to a report released today by RE/MAX Canada.

news.headline: RE/MAX (RMAX) Shares Skyrocket, What You Need To Know
news.summary: Shares of real estate franchise company RE/MAX (NYSE:RMAX) jumped 15.2% in the morning session after the company reported second quarter earnings results. RE/MAX exceeded analysts' EPS expectations. The company also maintained its full year revenue guidance, which is comforting. Zooming out, we think this was a fine quarter featuring some areas of strength.
